tc(utf, 0a) - new line.description: A tc(utf) call returning a new line.

tc(utf, 20) - space ( ).description: A tc(utf) call returning a space ( ).

tc(utf, 21) - exclamation mark (!).description: A tc(utf) call returning an exclamation mark (!).

tc(utf, 22) - quotation mark (\").description: A tc(utf) call returning a quotation mark (").

tc(utf, 24) - dollar sign ($).description: A tc(utf) call returning a dollar sign ($).

tc(utf, 25) - percent sign (%).description: A tc(utf) call returning a percent sign (%).

tc(utf, 26) - ampersand (&).description: A tc(utf) call returning an ampersand (&).

tc(utf, 28) - opening parenthesis.description: A tc(utf) call returning an opening parenthesis.

tc(utf, 29) - closing parenthesis.description: A tc(utf) call returning a closing parenthesis.

tc(utf, 2a) - asterisk (*).description: A tc(utf) call returning an asterisk (*).

tc(utf, 2b) - plus sign (+).description: A tc(utf) call returning a plus sign (+).

tc(utf, 2c) - comma (,).description: A tc(utf) call returning a comma (,).

tc(utf, 2d) - minus (-).description: A tc(utf) call returning a minus (-).

tc(utf, 2f) - slash (/).description: A tc(utf) call returning a slash (/).

tc(utf, 3c) - less-than (<).description: A tc(utf) call returning a less-than sign (<).

tc(utf, 3d) - equals (=).description: A tc(utf) call returning an equals sign (=).

tc(utf, 3e) - greater-than (>).description: A tc(utf) call returning a greater-than (>).

tc(utf, 5e) - exponentiation operator sy.description: A tc(utf) call returning the exponentiation operator symbol (^).

tc(utf, 7c) - pipe (|).description: A tc(utf) call returning a pipe symbol (|).

tc(utf, 7e) - tilde (~).description: A tc(utf) call returning a tilde (~).
